info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 27 at 1:32PM CDT until March 27 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville TX
info.description:
TORBRO
The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... South central Starr County in Deep South Texas...
* Until 200 PM CDT.
* At 132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over La Grulla, or near Garciasville, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* This dangerous storm will be near... Sullivan City, Grulla Middle School, Alto Bonito, Cuevitas, and La Grulla around 140 PM CDT.
Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Havana.
info.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 2:00 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 2:00 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 2:00 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 2:00 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
